question: Which Indian Badminton player has been appointed a new member of the governing body of Sports Authority of India (SAI)?
explanation: India\'s most successful Badminton Doubles specialist Jwala Gutta has been appointed a new member of the governing body of Sports Authority of India (SAI). Two-time Olympian Jwala won the bronze medal at the 2011 World Championships. She is also a 2010 Delhi Commonwealth Games champion and a silver medallist at the 2014 Glasgow Games in women\'s doubles.
